TopicTitle: [Question] How do you add a reputaion comment and make that person have points?

Articles.Content:
Post in the comments below:

Edited October 20, 2014 by CDK

Moving this to the Kerbal Network subforum, since that's where questions of this sort go

If you look at the left side of the bottom row of a particular post, you should see a set of symbols for various different options. The six-pointed star lets you "Give Reputation" to the poster for that particular post.

Moving this to the Kerbal Network subforum, since that's where questions of this sort go

If you look at the left side of the bottom row of a particular post, you should see a set of symbols for various different options. The six-pointed star lets you "Give Reputation" to the poster for that particular post.

What he said, that's basically it. I wish more people used that little button.
